ability.name: Temperamental Weather
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Sunny Castform and switch it with Snow-cloud Castform. (Any cards attached to Snow-cloud Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Snow-cloud Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Blizzard
attacks.text: If Snow-cloud Castform has any Holon Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Body Odor
ability.text: As long as Weezing is the Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Bodies between turns.

attacks.name: Mist Attack
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Temperamental Weather
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Sunny Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Draw
attacks.text: Draw a card. If Castform has any Holon Energy cards attached to it, draw 2 more cards.

ability.name: Duplicate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy cards attached to Ditto.

attacks.name: Fast Evolution
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Psychic Boom
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Duplicate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.text: Remove 3 damage counters from Ditto (all if there are less than 3).

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Bagon.

ability.name: Duplicate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Ditto.

ability.name: Duplicate
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Ditto and switch it with Ditto. (Any cards attached to Ditto, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Ditto on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Duplicate Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Holon's Magnemite
text: You may attach this as an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. While attached, this card is a Special Energy card and provides Colorless Energy.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Confusion Gas
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
